works.title: Software Engineer
works.company: Vestel Electronics R&D Corp - Vestel Group

achievements.description: Design, development, and maintenance of Vestel Smart TV Portal: a multi- language, multi-branded, cross-browser worldwide entertainment web portal for over 6 million users.
Designed and developed Smart TV Portal user management panel and electronic information booklet.
Design and development of iOS application to control IP Cameras and NVR devices. Integrating C++ SDK to iOS Swift application.
Design and development of multi-language, multi-role based e-commerce website.
End to end design and development of augmented reality iOS application. Designed for interior design purposes as decision guidance in real-time.
Design and development of native iOS applications that are published through App Store.
AR design environment in real-time with either uploaded USDZ models or sample models.
Password generator application provides strong, unique passwords for each platform and account pair.
Design and development of native iOS AR applications.

A cutting-edge LiDAR-based application that allows users to create accurate 3D models of real-world objects with ease. Using AR Capture, users can scan items to generate detailed 3D representations, which can then be shared through a QR code, enabling others to instantly view the model without additional software.

An immersive augmented reality application that enables users to visualize 3D models in real-world environments instantly. Built with ARKit and RealityKit, it supports interactive model placement, scaling, and rotation with realistic lighting and shadows. AR Viewer leverages App Clips for instant access, allowing users to preview models without installing the full app.
